sentence: But he’s held off on endorsing a Senate candidate to go up against incumbent Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly.
title: Trump kicks off midterm year still stuck on last election

sentence: In a new campaign ad, Arizona Republican Senate candidate Jim Lamon — appearing as an Old West-style sheriff — shoots at an actor playing his political opponent, incumbent Sen. Mark Kelly (D-AZ).
author: Josh Israel
title: Arizona GOP Candidate Posts Video Threatening To Shoot Democrats

sentence: Arizona Senators Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly announced that federal funds are headed for Arizona projects Friday, including several that will impact Pinal County.
title: Senators tout federal funds headed to Pinal County
